name: Heaventropy
description:
Heaventropy

Day follows night. Night follows day.

Get to the "Heavenly Crystal" by jumping on platforms.

Rules

You have two types of energy: day and night.

To increase this energy, it is necessary to catch crystals of the appropriate type.

Day - day crystals

At night - night crystals.

If you catch the wrong type of crystal, then your energy decreases.

If the energy of any of the types runs out, then you will lose

If you fall, then you lose.

Damaged platforms are completely destroyed after a while, be careful.

Controls

A - Left

D - Right

Hold the space bar to accumulate jump energy and release it to jump
